name: One-Hit Wonders from Classic TV Trivia Game | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: James Garner was fine in 'Maverick' as Bret Maverick. He went on to have a fine career, but the fellow who played his brother, Bart Maverick, didn't do as well.
questions.explanation:
Jack Kelly.

	Too bad: Kelly was good in the show. Hardin was 'Bronco' and Hutchins was 'Sugarfoot'. Ward was in a western called 'The Dakotas'

questions.text: The actor who played the title role of 'Cheyenne' didn't hit in a big way.
questions.explanation:
Clint Walker.

	Strong silent type - but he never became a big star. Lupton was in 'Broken Arrow', Russell was in 'Lawman'. Case was in 'The Deputy'.

questions.text: Edd Byrnes scored as 'Kookie'. What was the show?
questions.explanation:
77 Sunset Strip.

	He had his 15 minutes, but couldn't keep it going. The others were also tv shows.

questions.text: James Franciscus was expected to become a major movie star - but it never happened. He did star in this tv series.
questions.explanation:
Mr. Novak

	He played a teacher. Jim Hutton was Queen and Peter Lawford was in 'Thin Man'

Clayton Moore.

	Did he ever do anything else? Smith and Fuller were in 'Laramie'. Coffin was in '26 Men'

questions.text: Carl Betz is best known for 'The Donna Reed Show', but he later starred as a lawyer in this tv series.
questions.explanation:
Judd for the Defense.

	Okay, he's a two hit wonder. Arthur Hill was Marshall. 'Bold Ones ' and 'Name of the Game' had multiple stars

questions.text: This actor hit it big in 'The Virginian' tv series - then sort of dropped out of sight.
questions.explanation:
James Drury.

	Drury did nice work in the series. Conway was 'Tombstone Territory', Jones was 'Jesse James', Brown was in 'Lawman'

questions.text: This actor had a hit as 'Dobie Gillis'.
questions.explanation:
Dwayne Hickman.

	Hickman was perfect as Dobie. Dow was in 'Beaver' and Gray was in 'Father Knows Best'. Hamer was in 'Make Room for Daddy' with Danny Thomas

questions.text: Vince Edwards never quite achieved great stardom - despite early success in this tv series.
questions.explanation:
Ben Casey.

	Richard Chamberlain was Kildare. Richard Boone did 'Medic'. Chad Everett was in 'Center'

questions.text: This actor was in a tepid comedy called 'Friends and Lovers'.
questions.explanation:
Paul Sand.

	Bessell was in 'That Girl'. Maharis did 'Route 66'.
